doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 3 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 120[Air Date: 10/13/1984]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 3 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 120[Air Date: 10/13/1984]

Pride and ProgressNews - highlights:1. Sentencing of Maine teens in death of Charles Howard, a gay man2. San Francisco rejects extending employment benefits to gay partners of city workers3. First Ronald Reagan versus Walter Mondale debate viewed by gay Mondale supportersCOMMERCIAL: "Badlands," NYC gay bar4. Sports Report5. Interview with Ivan [Deeds] about Gay Narcotics Anonymous6. Sweden as a place for political asylum for gays7. Sentencing of Gary Lee Hopper, a male hustler, in slashing and attempted robbery of gay man8. Gay center opens in Allentown, Pennsylvania9. Interview with Peter Vogel, Chairperson for New York Gay Task ForceCOMMERCIAL: Rio Adventure, Orpheo travel agencyCOMMERCIAL: Chamberlain and Associates, career service professionals10. Interview with Peter Guardino, Gay Police Officers Action League11. Proposal to make West Hollywood a cityCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native"Healthline: Conversations with GMHC: Dr. Scott Croxson, Fellow Immunopathology, discusses HTLV virusCOMMERCIAL: "The Connection," a gay newspaper
The Right Stuff:COMMERCIAL: National Fund for Human Dignity with actor Mike Farrell1. Footage from San Francisco memorial for John Simms, who passed away from AIDSCOMMERCIAL: H. Clay Friedrichs Realtors, New JerseyCOMMERCIAL: Rio Adventure, Orpheo travel agency2.Interview with director Robert Epstein, producer Richard Schmiechen, and publicist Vito Russo, "The Times of Harvey Milk"COMMERCIAL: Pensione, San Francisco HotelCOMMERCIAL: Spur Productions3. "Swan in Love," commentary and clips about motion pictureCOMMERCIAL National Fund for Human Dignity with actor Jack AlbertsonCOMMERCIAL: World of Video4. More from interviews about "The Times of Harvey Milk"/ closing credits
